title: ExCALIBUR: Domain-Speciﬁc Language (DSL) and Performance Portability Assessment
summary: This document describes work for the ExCALIBUR project NEPTUNE at the point of Deliverable 3.2. It binds technical reports related to performance portability, specifically 'Identiﬁcation of Testbed Platforms and Applications' and 'Evaluation of Approaches to Performance Portability'.
